Hey,

I have removed the personal information (account names) from your OP. In this case, tell your friend to follow the [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) FAQ to get his account back. The standard process is that they will place a security lock on the account until the original owner can be verified. This will take some time and is not instant, so please be patient. 

Good luck!
